solution_line_template: If Levi wants to beat him by {target_difference}, he needs to score a total of {brother_total_score} + {target_difference} = <<{brother_total_score}+{target_difference}={levi_target_score}>>{levi_target_score} times.
Levi needs to score another {levi_target_score} - {levi_initial_score} = <<{levi_target_score}-{levi_initial_score}={levi_additional_scores_needed}>>{levi_additional_scores_needed} times.
